Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.0.4, Win 8.1 Ã‘â€¦64 RAM 16GB

All going good till i'm reverting to VAB. i got strange substance outside VAB door, and after go to launch got second pic. And game froze after that.

Yup, one of the mods doing this. I have a lot of mods (but still OK with RAM). MAy be someone faced this and solved this already..

You really need to upload the output_log.txt file from the KSP_Data folder (from a run when this problem happens, KSP recreates the log file every on every run) along with a list of the mods you have installed (and their versions) to some file sharing service (e.g. dropbox). Chances are that there is some indication in there of what is going wrong...

When you say "but still OK with RAM", what do you mean? How much memory is KSP actually using? If you are using the official 1.0.4 release then this is a 32bit program and can not use more than ~3.5 gig of RAM before it will crash.

There is a memory leak in KSP when reverting to the VAB (as well as several others) which will cause problems if you start off too close to the memory limit.
